item.title: Basic Jekyll GitHub Blog
item.description: So I finally got round to sorting out the tech blog. I chose to use Jekyll rather than WordPress as I didn’t want to deal with constant updates, security vulnerabilities and backing up of the site. Jekyll generates a static site based on the posts created, but still has the advantages of a CMS like tags and categories. Posts are written using Markdown in a plain text file, making it very easy to do the formatting.
